name: Werewolves The Game v0.9 (Beta)
description:
This game is a Fan Game of the Castronegro Werewolves card game but recreating it for PC and Online.

(This game only uses the original game rules, but partially modified for an online environment)

All images used in this game have been generated by AI Stable Diffusion. 🤖

Synopsis:

It all starts in a small, quiet village.

One night, suddenly, murders began to happen.

After each murder, before the end of the night, howling was heard.

The villagers decided to ask the Seer of the village, to which she replied...

Wolves! Werewolves! This village has been cursed by werewolves. You have to find the fake villagers and kill them, in which case it will be our downfall.

The villagers decided that every day, at dawn, to sacrifice one villager by voting.

Werewolves, devour all the villagers to satisfy your hunger.

That's where you, the players, come in, you are each one of the villagers. Some of you may be simple villagers, villagers with quirks, or nasty werewolves who just want to devour the rest.

¡Let the game begin!

Objective:

The main objective is simple:

- The Werewolves have to exterminate the rest of the players, the problem is that they can only kill one player each night.

- The rest of the players have to kill the Werewolves, the problem is that they don't know who is who, and they can only kill one player at the beginning of the day, by voting.

- There are also characters with specialties, for example the Seer, at the beginning of each night she can choose to see a player's letter.

Will you manage to survive or hunt down all the players? Good luck!

Warning!

  • This game needs to have Steam open in order to play.
  • To join a private game, you need to use the Steam invite system.
  • It is recommended to use Discord or another similar app for the best experience.
  • Game for 8-18 players.
  • A minimum of 8 players is required to start the game.
  • Game available for Windows (64-bit) and Linux (64-bit).
  • This is my first online game, so it's normal that there are some bugs. It would be helpful if you could report it using the "Report Bug" button in the game. 😄
  • The translations may not be quite right. I had to translate everything. 😭
